features.title: Features
features.description: Our professional HEIC to PDF converter delivers industry-leading functionality for seamless conversion. Transform Apple's HEIC format into universally accessible PDF documents with our comprehensive HEIC to PDF solution, perfect for professional document management and sharing workflows.

item1.title: Intelligent Batch HEIC to PDF Processing
item1.description: Convert multiple HEIC files to PDF simultaneously with our advanced batch HEIC to PDF engine. Create individual PDFs or merge multiple HEIC images into consolidated PDF documents for streamlined file organization.

item2.title: Premium HEIC to PDF Quality Retention
item2.description: Our sophisticated algorithms preserve original image fidelity during conversion. Every HEIC to PDF transformation maintains color accuracy, resolution, and metadata for professional-grade output.

item3.title: Seamless HEIC to PDF Cloud Integration
item3.description: Import HEIC files directly from cloud storage platforms and save converted PDF documents back to your preferred location. Our  service integrates with iCloud, Google Drive, and Dropbox for enhanced workflow efficiency.

item4.title: Ultra-Fast HEIC to PDF Engine
item4.description: Experience lightning-speed HEIC to PDF conversion with our optimized processing technology. Our enhanced HEIC to PDF algorithms deliver converted files in seconds, outperforming standard conversion tools for maximum productivity.

item5.title: Universal HEIC to PDF Compatibility
item5.description: Access our HEIC to PDF converter across all platforms and devices. Whether using Windows, macOS, iOS, or Android, our cross-platform HEIC to PDF solution ensures consistent performance and accessibility.

item6.title: Intuitive HEIC to PDF Interface
item6.description: Navigate our streamlined HEIC to PDF conversion process effortlessly. Upload HEIC files, initiate conversion, and download PDF results with our user-friendly HEIC to PDF platform designed for users of all technical backgrounds.

schnell.title: HEIC to PDF Premium
schnell.description: Our premium converter offers additional features including batch processing, watermark-free output, and priority support. The premium version operates up to 10 times faster than the standard version, optimized for speed and efficiency, catering to users who need to convert large volumes of images quickly. This version is ideal for professionals and business users, striking the perfect balance between performance and accessibility. We offer users 5 free opportunities each month to experience the lightning-fast conversion of the premium version, allowing you to witness its incredible speed firsthand.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Common questions about HEIC to PDF conversion

pricing.description: Need more conversions or larger file support?

q1.question: What is HEIC format?
q1.answer: HEIC (High Efficiency Image Container) is Apple's default image format since iOS 11. It saves about 50% storage space compared to JPEG while maintaining the same image quality.

q2.question: Why do I need to convert HEIC to PDF?
q2.answer: While HEIC format works great on Apple devices, it has poor compatibility on other platforms (like Windows, Android). Converting to PDF ensures files can be viewed and shared on any device.

q3.question: Will conversion affect image quality?
q3.answer: We use advanced conversion algorithms to maintain original image quality to the maximum extent. The converted PDF quality is virtually identical to the original HEIC file.

q4.question: Are there file size limitations?
q4.answer: Free users can process files up to 10MB each, with batch upload supporting up to 5 files. For larger files or more quantity, you can upgrade to a paid plan.

q5.question: Are my files secure?
q5.answer: Yes, we take user privacy very seriously. All files are transmitted via SSL encryption and automatically deleted within 3 hours after conversion. We don't save or share any of your files.

q6.question: How long does conversion take?
q6.answer: Typically, the conversion process completes within 30 seconds. Actual time depends on file size and current server load. Batch conversions may take longer.

faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Get answers to the most common questions about our pricing and service.

item1.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
item1.answer: Yes, absolutely! You can cancel your subscription at any time from your account settings. There are no cancellation fees, and you'll continue to have Pro access until the end of your current billing period.

item2.question: What payment methods do you accept?
item2.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express) and PayPal accounts. All payments are processed securely through PayPal, ensuring your payment information is always protected.

item3.question: Is my payment information secure?
item3.answer: Absolutely. We use PayPal, a leading payment processor trusted by millions of businesses worldwide. We never store your payment information on our servers - all transactions are handled securely by PayPal with bank-level encryption.

item4.question: Do you offer refunds?
item4.answer: Yes, we offer a 7-day money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied with our Pro service within the first 7 days of your subscription, contact us for a full refund, no questions asked.

item5.question: What happens if I exceed the free plan limits?
item5.answer: If you reach your daily conversion limit on the free plan, you'll need to wait until the next day to convert more files, or upgrade to Pro for unlimited conversions. We'll always notify you when you're approaching your limits.

item6.question: Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan anytime?
item6.answer: Yes! You can upgrade to Pro anytime to get unlimited conversions immediately. If you want to downgrade, you can cancel your subscription and you'll continue to have Pro access until the end of your current billing period.
